subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: While Formula One has had a trend of breaking records of youthfulness, older drivers have still been able to prove their worth. Age was not a factor in Ferrari's choice of the 38-year-old Luca Badoer for the European Grand Prix this weekend.
snippet: While Formula One has had a trend of breaking records of youthfulness, older drivers have still been able to prove their worth. Age was not a factor in Ferrari's choice of the 38-year-old Luca Badoer for the European Grand Prix this weekend.
